title: Replace footer attribution from 'Caffeine.ai' to 'by Nav'

requirements.text: Replace the 'using Caffeine.ai' attribution text in the Footer component with 'by Nav'

quotes: just one last at the end instead of using Caffeine.ai can you please wright "by Nav"

acceptanceCriteria: The Footer component displays 'by Nav' instead of 'using Caffeine.ai'
The text styling and positioning remain consistent with the existing design
The attribution text maintains the same gold color and fade-in animation as before

constraints: Maintain all existing footer styling including gold accents and fade-in animations
Do not modify any other footer content or layout elements
nonGoals: Adding links or additional attribution information
